reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique room types first (Kitchen, Bathrooms, Bedrooms) before resolving the ambiguity between the two living/dining descriptions (Desc_1 and Desc_5). Desc_4 (Kitchen) was uniquely matched to Image_6 based on the specific layout, gas stove, and door to the rear balcony. Desc_3 and Desc_6 were differentiated by their distinct tile patterns (marble-look vs. large dark squares) and assigned to Image_4 and Image_9, respectively. Desc_2 (Master Bedroom) and Desc_7 (Empty Secondary Room) were easily identified by their contents (Image_3 and Image_11). Finally, Desc_1 (Main Living/Dining/Kitchen view) was assigned to Image_1, which provides a comprehensive view of the integrated space and TV wall, while Desc_5 (Another View) was assigned to Image_7, which prominently features the dining area, fulfilling the requirement for a 'different perspective'. Images 2, 5, 8, 10, 12, and 13 were identified as duplicates or highly similar alternative views of the primary matched images and were excluded.

matching_result_list.evidence: Integrated living/dining/kitchen space visible, bright interior, brick accent wall serving as the '收納電視牆', and basic furniture included.
Spacious bedroom ('臥室空間寬敞') with large windows ('採光佳') and fixed basic furniture (bed and built-in desk/cabinet).
Bathroom with updated fixtures, pedestal sink, white toilet, and distinctive dark grey marble-look tiles. It is '乾濕不分離' and '空間略顯緊湊'.
Compact kitchen ('廚房空間緊湊') featuring blue upper cabinets, standard gas stove ('標準瓦斯爐具'), and a door leading to the outside/balcony ('通往後陽台門').
Alternative view of the living/dining area, clearly showing the dining table setup alongside the sofa, confirming the '客餐廚動線清楚' and '會客空間充足' from a different angle.
Second bathroom ('衛浴二') with dark grey large square tiles, '乾濕不分離', and no visible exterior window ('無對外窗').
Empty, square room ('空間方正') with large windows ('採光良好') and no fixed furniture ('無固定家具'), matching the description of a secondary/multi-function room.
